profile.name: Rafail Tasakis
profile.bioHtml:
Entrepreneur with EU and US experience, blending scientific with business skills. Trained as a bioinformatics scientist with a PhD in cancer biology, I later transitioned into cross-functional roles within startup ecosystems with founder-like responsibilities, spanning consulting, product and business development, and fundraising strategy. Having a strong and expanding international network, I am currently pursuing an Executive MBA while working as an independent consultant supporting innovators and investors at the intersection of life sciences and deep tech.

Having a global mindset and the ambition to make a tangible impact, I maintain a high-ownership and responsible attitude.
profile.quoteHtml: My mission is to bring bold innovation faster to where it is most needed.
